Search and rescue operation under way on Aoraki Mt Cook after climbers overdue https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/search-and-rescue-operation-under-way-on-aoraki-mt-cook-after-climbers-overdue/RL75EJAELNGT5AXKFIHUUFBX7U/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/search-and-rescue-operation-under-way-on-aoraki-mt-cook-after-climbers-overdue/RL75EJAELNGT5AXKFIHUUFBX7U/ Police said the three climbers had been due to complete their climb at 8.30am today. Transport Accident Investigation Commission launches inquiry into Air NZ flight to Sydney https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/transport-accident-investigation-commission-launches-inquiry-into-air-nz-flight-to-sydney/OFPZTWDPSRHJRIOBUYCY42VZ5U/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/transport-accident-investigation-commission-launches-inquiry-into-air-nz-flight-to-sydney/OFPZTWDPSRHJRIOBUYCY42VZ5U/ TAIC probes Air NZ flight NZ240's mayday; witnesses urged to report unusual events. Auckland charter boat mayhem: Police meet passengers at Viaduct after booze cruise turns violent https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-charter-boat-mayhem-police-meet-passengers-at-viaduct-after-booze-cruise-turns-violent/GFHUIBCWW5AXVOKXE4SFL7QYQQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-charter-boat-mayhem-police-meet-passengers-at-viaduct-after-booze-cruise-turns-violent/GFHUIBCWW5AXVOKXE4SFL7QYQQ/ George BlockThe booze cruise descended into anarchy on Saturday as fights broke out on board. Mon, 02 Dec 2024 06:00:00 +0000 Police were seen waiting for a boat to dock at Auckland's Eastern Viaduct before arresting several men when they got off early Saturday evening. Photo supplied

Pharmac minister and chairwoman refuse to express confidence in chief executive Sarah Fitt https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/pharmac-minister-and-chairwoman-refuse-to-express-confidence-in-chief-executive-sarah-fitt/DRFD7CN5RREW3PS3HBOFXUHCG4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/pharmac-minister-and-chairwoman-refuse-to-express-confidence-in-chief-executive-sarah-fitt/DRFD7CN5RREW3PS3HBOFXUHCG4/ Adam PearseThe revelation came amid a scrappy start to Parliament's second scrutiny week.
